verse.name: v1
verse.lines: “All things are ready,” come to the feast! Come, for the table now is spread; Ye famishing, ye weary, come, And thou shalt be richly fed.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Hear the invitation, Come, “whosoever will”; Praise God for full salvation For “whosoever will.”

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: “All things are ready,” come to the feast! Come, for the door is open wide; A place of honor is reserved For you at the Master’s side.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: “All things are ready,” come to the feast! Come, while He waits to welcome thee; Delay not while this day is thine, Tomorrow may never be.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: “All things are ready,” come to the feast! Leave ev’ry care and worldly strife; Come, feast upon the love of God, And drink everlasting life.
